title: Divine Lakshmi Diamond Haaram Set with Ruby and Emerald Accents
materials: South Sea Pearls. Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Intricately designed Haaram featuring a delicate floral and paisley (manga malai) motif studded with sparkling diamonds. The central pendant showcases a Lakshmi design, symbolising prosperity and good fortune. Accented with cabochon-cut Rubies and Emeralds for added vibrancy and antique feel. The matching Jhumkas echo the Haaram's design, featuring a delicate paisley top and a pearl-drop base.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamonds) with striking accents of red (rubies) and green (emeralds). The pearls add a touch of creamy elegance.
occasions: Perfect for traditional South Indian weddings (vivaham/పెళ్లి)
and other auspicious occasions. Also a stunning statement piece for high-end social gatherings.
description: This Lakshmi Diamond Haaram set is a testament to the artistry of South Indian craftsmanship. The use of high-quality diamonds, natural gemstones, and the intricate design make it a valuable heirloom piece. The combination of traditional design and modern aesthetics ensures it will be cherished for generations. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees lasting shine and durability. A symbol of prosperity and elegance.
